case_vignette: A 50-YEAR-OLD FEMALE WITH NO PERTINENT MEDICAL HISTORY PRESENTS WITH A TWO YEAR HISTORY OF DARK SPOTS ON THE FACE. SHE NOTICED THE DARK SPOTS WHEN APPLYING MAKE UP ONE DAY. SHE DENIES ANY PRURITUS, PAIN, TRAUMA OR USE OF ANY NEW TOPICAL SKIN PRODUCTS. THE DARK SPOTS HAVE INCREASED IN NUMBER AND MAY HAVE SLIGHTLY GROWN IN SIZE. SHE HAS NOT TRIED ANY TREATMENTS. PHYSICAL EXAMINATION REVEALS BROWN IRREGULAR PATCHY POORLY DEMARCATED MACULES COALESCING INTO PATCHES ON THE BILATERAL ZYGOMATIC CHEEKS WITH SOME EXTENSION ON LATERAL CHEEKS.
question: What is the final diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Ask different questions to cover more information. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have dark spots on my face that have been increasing in number and size over the past two years.
Have you noticed any changes in your skin texture or other skin symptoms besides the dark spots?
No, I haven't noticed any changes in skin texture or other skin symptoms.
Do these spots itch, burn, or cause any pain?
No, the spots do not itch, burn, or cause any pain.
Have you had significant sun exposure or used tanning beds frequently in the past?
I haven't used any new topical skin products or had any significant changes in sun exposure.
Do you have any other medical conditions or are you currently taking any medications?
No, I do not have any pertinent medical history or take any medications.
Do you have any family history of skin diseases or disorders?
I haven't mentioned any family history of skin diseases or disorders.
How old are you and what is your gender?
I am a 50-year-old female.
Final Diagnosis: Solar Lentigines
